title: Spiced potatoes and cauliflower with nuts
ingredients: ['400g potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm dice', 'pinch of saffron', '15g fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 small cauliflower, cut into small florets', '150ml vegetable stock, hot', '150g low-fat natural yoghurt', '3 tbsp ground almonds', '2 tsp garam masala', 'TO GARNISH', '50g cashew nuts, roughly chopped fresh coriander']
